channel.title: Network on 张 瀚 铎 Zhang Handuo
channel.description: Recent content in Network on 张 瀚 铎 Zhang Handuo

item.title: How to remotely edit your project without having to use VIM
item.description: I recently found an hot github repository called code-server which is able to run VS Code on a remote server, accessible through the browser. So it suddenly came to me an idea to remotely edit any code for free as long as you have a linux environment with Internet. Here I will introduce you how to remotely edit and run without the need of Teamviewer, Anydesk, or VcXsrv, etc. Another advantage is that you don’t have to use VIM!
